Sparkling Battle Star!

<size=45>Chapter 4: One Battle Star to Another</size>

scripts.say: Let's see, the next exercise should be starting in... Hm?
Oh, it's you, San Diego. Always nice to see you so upbeat.
Upbeat is my middle name~! You gotta be beaming with energy all day or else your brain'll turn to mush, you know!
I suppose. You can never have too much stamina.
... What? Is there something on my face?
You don't have a retrofit, yet you've got that aura thingy like it!
Retrofit...? Ah, right, heard you've been going around and asking everyone about it.
I'm learning things~! See, I spotted all these people with retrofits and had no clue what they were, so it got me curious!
Not every day you see that... You devoting all your focus to one thing, I mean.
I'm not sure why you're so curious, but my advice to you is to take in things at your own pace and you'll understand them eventually.
Yeah. Everybody learns new things and grow as people every day. How they do it differs from person to person.
Retrofitting is the same. Don't think too much about everyone else's, focus on what you want yours to be, and you'll surely break free of your personal limits one day.
W-wow... I'm kinda dumbstruck, but it feels like you just gave the best motivational speech I've ever heard!
Glad to help someone second only to me in battle stars. Good luck with your goal, San Diego. I believe in you.
Wow, I'm feeling super-duper motivated now! It... it almost feels like I could retrofit right here, right now!
